parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To groan or sigh deeply. From ana and stenazo; to sigh deeply.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.
From genos; a generation; by implication, an age.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the base of semaino; an indication, especially ceremonially or supernaturally.
Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the base of semaino; an indication, especially ceremonially or supernaturally.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
From genos; a generation; by implication, an age.
